Package com.unitedbankingservices.banknote

Class AbstractBanknoteDispenser

java.lang.Object
com.unitedbankingservices.AbstractDevice<BanknoteDispenserObserver>
com.unitedbankingservices.banknote.AbstractBanknoteDispenser
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBanknoteDispenser, IDevice<BanknoteDispenserObserver>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BanknoteDispenserMR
public abstract class AbstractBanknoteDispenser extends AbstractDevice<BanknoteDispenserObserver> implements IBanknoteDispenser
The abstract base class of devices that dispense banknotes.

    • maxCapacity

      protected int maxCapacity
      Represents the maximum number of banknotes that this device can contain.

    • sink

      public Sink<Banknote> sink
      Represents the output sink of this dispenser.

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractBanknoteDispenser

      protected AbstractBanknoteDispenser(int capacity)
      Basic constructor.
      Parameters:
      capacity - The maximum number of banknotes that this device can contain.
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentSimulationException - If the capacity is non-positive.

  • Method Details

    • size

      public int size()
      Accesses the current number of banknotes in the dispenser. Requires power.
      Specified by:
      size in interface IBanknoteDispenser
      Returns:
      The number of banknotes currently in the dispenser.

    • receive

      protected void receive(Banknote banknote) throws TooMuchCashException, DisabledException
      Receives and stores the indicated banknote. Since not all dispensers support this operation, it is protected.
      Parameters:
      banknote - The banknote to store.
      Throws:
      TooMuchCashException - If this device is already full.
      DisabledException - If this device is disabled.
      NullPointerSimulationException - If the indicated banknote is null.

    • hasSpace

      protected boolean hasSpace()
      Checks whether this device has the space available to store one more banknote. Since not all dispensers support the storage of banknotes in this manner, this operation is protected. Requires power.
      Returns:
      true if the device has space for one more banknote; false, otherwise.

    • load

      public void load(Banknote... banknotes) throws TooMuchCashException
      Allows a set of banknotes to be loaded into the dispenser directly. Existing banknotes in the dispenser are not removed. Announces "banknotesLoaded" event. Requires power.
      Specified by:
      load in interface IBanknoteDispenser
      Parameters:
      banknotes - A sequence of banknotes to be added. Each may not be null.
      Throws:
      TooMuchCashException - if the number of banknotes to be loaded exceeds the capacity of the dispenser.
      SimulationException - If any banknote is null.

    • unload

      public List<Banknote> unload()
      Unloads banknotes from the dispenser directly. Announces "banknotesUnloaded" event. Requires power.
      Specified by:
      unload in interface IBanknoteDispenser
      Returns:
      A list of the banknotes unloaded. May be empty. Will never be null.

    • getCapacity

      public int getCapacity()
      Returns the maximum capacity of this banknote dispenser. Does not require power.
      Specified by:
      getCapacity in interface IBanknoteDispenser
      Returns:
      The capacity. Will be positive.

    • emit

      public void emit() throws OutOfCashException, DisabledException, TooMuchCashException
      Emits a single banknote from this banknote dispenser. If successful, announces "banknoteRemoved" event. If a successful banknote removal causes the dispenser to become empty, announces "banknotesEmpty" event. Requires power.
      Specified by:
      emit in interface IBanknoteDispenser
      Throws:
      TooMuchCashException - if the output channel is unable to accept another banknote.
      OutOfCashException - if no banknotes are present in the dispenser to release.
      DisabledException - if the dispenser is currently disabled.

    • notifyBanknoteRemoved

      protected void notifyBanknoteRemoved(Banknote banknote)
      Convenience operation that notifies all registered observers that a "banknoteRemoved" event has occurred on this device.
      Parameters:
      banknote - The banknote that has been removed.

    • notifyBanknotesEmpty

      protected void notifyBanknotesEmpty()
      Convenience operation that notifies all registered observers that a "banknotesEmpty" event has occurred on this device.

    • notifyBanknotesLoaded

      protected void notifyBanknotesLoaded(Banknote[] banknotes)
      Convenience operation that notifies all registered observers that a "banknotesLoaded" event has occurred on this device.
      Parameters:
      banknotes - The banknotes that have been loaded.

    • notifyBanknotesUnoaded

      protected void notifyBanknotesUnoaded(Banknote[] banknotes)
      Convenience operation that notifies all registered observers that a "banknotesUnloaded" event has occurred on this device.
      Parameters:
      banknotes - The banknotes that have been removed.

    • notifyBillAdded

      protected void notifyBillAdded(Banknote banknote)
      Convenience operation that notifies all registered observers that a "banknoteAdded" event has occurred on this device.
      Parameters:
      banknote - The banknote that has been removed.

      Convenience operation that notifies all registered observers that a "moneyFull" event has occurred on this device.
